name: chess-move-lister
description: code challege : lists all possible chess moves given a board and whose turn it is.

scripts.dev: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.copyStaticFiles: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css

author: jtyler
